column4: (She looks at your gag and makes a thumbs up.)
Hello cutie maid.  I hope you're not working too hard.
Hello Miss guard.  I trust everything is going smoothly.

(She growls.)  Rawr!  You look good sis.
Hello lady, I think I've seen you before, are you in the cosplay club?
Hello lady, you look familiar, you do cosplay?
Hello lady, are you new in the Box?
I'm DialogCharacterName.  I'm a member of the cosplay club here in the Box.
I'm a member of the Cosplay Club, or CC.  We are a new club in the Box.
(She blushes.)  Being restrained in a pet suit by a Dominatrix would be sweet.  But I have a club meeting very soon.
(She bows her head.)  I'm can't Miss Guard.  I have a club meeting very soon.
(She laughs at you.)  You're a kinky maid?  Sadly, I have a club meeting very soon.
(She smiles at you.)  I can't sis!  I have a CC meeting soon.
(She giggles.)  Sorry, I have a cosplay club meeting soon.
Maybe, what are you looking for?

column3: I'll go get you a free drink.
column4: (You go get her a free drink and she smiles.)  Rawr!  You're a wonderful maid.
The Box is a nice place.  But what I really like is the cosplay club.
Rawr!  I can't refuse a cosplay offer.  Strip down and I'll dress you to cosplay.
(You give some details on the girl you need to rescue, and she shrugs.)  I can't help you there.
(You give some details on the girl you need to kidnap, and she shrugs.)  I can't help you there.
(You give some details on the object you need to retrieve, and she shrugs.)  I can't help you there.
You found the right girl!  We have lots of paint at the cosplay club.
Alright then.  Anything else?
You certainly can!  (She runs to her club and returns with many paint cans.)
Alright then.  Anything else?
Rawr!  Use it well, have fun!  Anything else?

column3: You do have a great cosplay club.
column4: Rawr!  Well said.  Anything else?

column3: I know the best place for cosplay.
column4: Oh really?  Where do you go for cosplay?

column3: The Box isn't nice, it's great!
column4: (She giggles and nods.)
(She laughs at you.)  No way!  Rawr!  I do cosplay all year long.

column3: I think they have costumes at the supermarket.
column4: (She shakes her head no.)  That's not good enough for me.

column3: Have you heard of the Bondage Club?
column4: I've heard a little about it.  It's a good place to cosplay?
(She shakes her head no.)  Anything else?

column3: The have the best cosplayers in town.
column4: This is tempting!  Maybe I should go there someday.
(She shrugs.)  Yeah, probably.
(She shakes her head no.)  Anything else?
(She nods.)  Anything else?

column3: Would you like to go now?
column4: (She thinks for a few seconds.)  Deal!  I'll skip the meeting and go right now.  (Your infiltration skill has increased.)

column3: Would you like to go now?
